title: Trying to download PBE server but "Failed - File Incomplete"
body: On the NA Server I think PBE signups are open so I created an account, but I can't seem to download the PBE server for mac. It keeps saying "Failed - File incomplete" and idk what to do.

replies.body: you must keep clicking resume tell it finished downloading. Took me like 2min.

> [{quoted}](name=Asger420,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=c7Bdb9ou,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-10-22T23:47:43.881+0000)
>
> you must keep clicking resume tell it finished downloading. Took me like 2min.

youre a god

> [{quoted}](name=Asger420,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=c7Bdb9ou,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-10-22T23:47:43.881+0000)
>
> you must keep clicking resume tell it finished downloading. Took me like 2min.

thanks
My PBE .dmg file downloads, but I can't open it. When I try, it says that "image not recognized". Any tips?
Makes me think that download might not have worked 100%. I'd suggest deleting that one, and simply trying to download a new copy making sure you run it as admin when it's done.

We've gotten quite a few reports of this throughout the day and I've already passed this info along to the devs so that they can start taking a look. I don't have any info right at the moment, but I'll do my best to keep you folks updated as I get more info!

Same goes for me here... Rito pls help
{{champion:432}}

Happening for me too, I guess its a new issue? Mines is on Windows though
{{champion:245}}
Same here... but for me its for LoL download and PBE. Someone help.
